about_the_game:
Welcome to the Verve, where hallways don't end, doors always lead somewhere, and danger is imminent. You are RT-6, a member of LiminalLeap's highly-trained professional rescuing team. You are tasked to find the location of a small group of research scientists who sent out a high-level distress call, followed by complete radio silence. Good luck, the void of the Verve is unforgiving.


In this psychological horror game, play the singleplayer campaign where you explore the Verve, evade, and hide from entities, and rescue the research scientists deep within the Verve. After being sent into the Verve dimension, you start to realize and uncover the dark truth about LiminalLeap's practices, this isn't going to be a walk in the park.


You can also play multiplayer with your friends and run around at unreasonably fast speeds, evade unforgiving nextbots, attempt to survive in the Verve together, go surfing (NOT ON WATER), and more!


Verve has an extremely sophisticated movement engine allowing bunnyhopping, airstrafing, surfing on ramps, etc. You can execute some of the most complicated tricks and techniques to go lightning-fast and outrun all of your assailants!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2000 Series/Intel 7th Gen Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1600 Series/AMD Radeon RX 5000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PS Controller Support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5000 Series/Intel 13th Gen Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3000 Series/AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PS Controller Support
